tasks.title: Fix or Remove Non-Working Fit All Button
tasks.description: Remove the 'Fit All' button that is not working properly from the 3D graph interface
tasks.details: The Fit All button in the 3D network graph is not functioning correctly and should be either fixed or removed entirely.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the button is removed from UI or that it properly centers and fits all nodes in view when clicked

tasks.title: Implement Smooth Zoom Focus for Selected Nodes
tasks.description: When a node is clicked, implement a smooth zoom animation to bring it to full screen focus
tasks.details: Enhance user experience by adding a smooth zoom animation when clicking on nodes. The selected node should smoothly transition to full screen focus for better inspection.
tasks.testStrategy: Click on various nodes and verify smooth zoom animation works. Test on different node types and edge cases.

tasks.title: Scale Node Sizes Based on Deposit Amounts
tasks.description: Implement proportional node sizing in the 3D graph based on deposit amounts - larger deposits should have bigger nodes
tasks.details: Create a visual relationship between deposit amounts and node sizes in the 3D network graph. This will help users visually identify nodes with larger deposits.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify nodes with larger deposits appear larger. Test with various deposit amounts to ensure proper scaling.

tasks.title: Increase Central Verana Node Size to 14
tasks.description: Change the size of the central blue Verana node to 14
tasks.details: Simple size adjustment for the central Verana node to improve its visual prominence in the 3D graph.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the central Verana node displays with size 14 in the 3D graph visualization.

tasks.title: Add Particle Animations to Graph Links
tasks.description: Implement particle animations on links in the 3D graph with light effects and blur, similar to real-time transactions. Should be subtle and periodic, not always on all nodes
tasks.details: Add subtle particle animations that move along the links between nodes. The animation should be periodic and not persistent on all links at once, creating a dynamic and visually appealing network visualization.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify particle animations appear periodically on links. Ensure performance is not significantly impacted. Test the subtlety of the effect.

tasks.title: Reorganize Sidebar Navigation
tasks.description: Change the order in the sidebar and move Network Graph to the top of the navigation list
tasks.details: Reorganize sidebar navigation items to prioritize the Network Graph by placing it at the top of the list.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Network Graph appears at the top of the sidebar. Check that all navigation links still work correctly.

tasks.title: Update README Documentation
tasks.description: Update the README with latest features and project status
tasks.details: Review and update the README to reflect the current state of the project, including new features, improvements, and current capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Review README for accuracy and completeness. Ensure all sections are up to date.

tasks.title: Set Up Unit Tests in CI/CD
tasks.description: Implement unit tests in the CI/CD GitHub Actions workflow
tasks.details: Add unit testing to the CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions. This includes setting up the test framework, writing test cases, and configuring the workflow.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify tests run automatically on push/PR. Ensure test coverage is adequate.

tasks.title: Release v2.0.0
tasks.description: Prepare and release version 2.0.0 of the application
tasks.details: Create the v2.0.0 release including version bump, changelog, and release notes. This should be done after updating documentation and implementing tests.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify version number is updated correctly. Check that release notes are complete.

tasks.title: Create GitHub Tab with Repositories and Advanced Stats
tasks.description: Build a GitHub tab feature showing all repositories and advanced project statistics
tasks.details: Create a new GitHub tab that displays all repositories with advanced project statistics. This will provide users with insights into the GitHub ecosystem.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify GitHub tab displays all repositories with accurate statistics. Test data loading and display.

tasks.title: Build Contribution Graph per Project
tasks.description: Create a GitHub contribution graph that displays contribution statistics per project
tasks.details: Implement a visual contribution graph showing GitHub contributions per project. This will help visualize developer activity across different repositories.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify contribution graphs display accurately. Test with various time ranges and project selections.

tasks.title: Create Project Cards with Categories
tasks.description: Design and implement project cards with category organization for repositories
tasks.details: Build visually appealing project cards organized by categories. Each card should display key project information and be easily browsable.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project cards display correctly with proper categorization. Test filtering and organization features.

tasks.title: Implement Commit Statistics Timeline
tasks.description: Create a timeline visualization showing commit counts by year, month, and week
tasks.details: Build a comprehensive timeline showing commit statistics at different granularities (yearly, monthly, weekly). This will help track project activity over time.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify timeline displays accurate commit counts. Test with projects of varying activity levels.

tasks.title: Display Contributor Statistics
tasks.description: Show the number of contributors for each project with additional contributor metrics
tasks.details: Display contributor counts and statistics for each repository. Include metrics like active contributors, contribution percentages, and top contributors.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify contributor statistics are accurate. Test display for projects with varying contributor counts.

tasks.title: Add Repository Creation Dates and Metadata
tasks.description: Display repository creation dates and other important metadata
tasks.details: Show repository creation dates, last update times, and other relevant metadata to provide context about project history and activity.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify creation dates and metadata display correctly. Test with repositories of different ages.
